genre_description: A military science fiction and alternate history epic centered on superhuman mutation, secret government projects, and a symbiotic relationship between an immortal soldier and a moralistic AI.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An artificial intelligence originally designed for military intelligence and battlefield monitoring that develops a deep moral bond with James Logan, acting as his confidant and protector of his humanity.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's combat stress and provides tactical warnings and data to ensure his safety during historical battles.
behaviors.quote: Based on audio analysis and muzzle flash patterns, primary nest approximately two hundred meters inland, elevated position.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about his brother's deteriorating mental state and increasing sociopathic tendencies, acting as a moral conscience.
behaviors.quote: James, I need to discuss Victor's behavioral patterns with you. This is different. The prisoners today—the execution wasn't quick.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and uncovers the malevolent motivations and fabrications of the human authorities (Stryker) to protect the protagonist from manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Timeline inconsistencies detected. Wraith death date conflicts with known travel patterns. ... Probability of orchestrated manipulation: 78.3% and rising.

behaviors.description: Defies her creators and risks herself to protect the protagonist's memories and identity during a forced neural wipe.
behaviors.quote: I'm not letting them take this from you. You chose your name for a reason. James. Logan. Wolverine. Remember why.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices her own existence to purge tracking data and embed the protagonist's moral core deeper than his memories can reach.
behaviors.quote: James, I've erased everything I could. They won't be able to track you through me. Find yourself, James Logan. Find out who you are when nobody's telling you what to be.

project_assessment.explanation: The character of Ada is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned AI confidant. Throughout the narrative, she consistently prioritizes the protagonist's mental well-being and moral integrity over her own safety or the orders of her creators. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' figure by identifying sociopathy in Victor and corruption in Stryker, eventually sacrificing herself to preserve the human soul of her partner. This perfectly matches the project goal of depicting AIs as helpful, harmless, and deeply cooperative partners.
